$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/readme.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/readme.text:
!! Bottom Toolbar Experience An additional toolbar at the bottom comes in handy for actions you might use after seeing through a tiddler. !!! Special buttons included
Special buttons for the bottom toolbar At the moment there are these:
    <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ToolbarBottom]]""">
  • <>
More buttons for the ''bottom toolbar'' can be added by tagging them with <>.
Most buttons from the standard view toolbar – the one at the top of each tiddler – can also be activated in the bottom toolbar. This plugin includes new buttons for the standard toolbar too, they can be useful at the top and at the bottom.
Additional buttons for the tiddler toolbar At the moment there are these:
    <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]]""">
  • <>
{{$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/cfx}}
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/readme.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/readme

$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/styles/buttons.c.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/styles/buttons.c.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/styles/buttons.css

$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/toolbar.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/toolbar.text:
\whitespace trim <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]suffix[styles/hide/bottom-toolbar.css]!tag[$:/tags/Stylesheet]]""" variable="none"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" value="tc-btn-invisible">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ToolbarBottom]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]] -[[$:/core/ui/Buttons/fold-bar]] +[!is[draft]] :filter[lookup[$:/config/Tix/ToolbarBottomButtons/Visibility/]match[show]] :sort:date[lookup:modified[$:/config/Tix/ToolbarBottomButtons/Visibility/]] :sort:date[lookup[$:/config/Tix/ToolbarBottomButtons/Timestamp/]]" variable="listItem" storyview="pop"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/toolbar.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/toolbar

$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/Tools.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/Tools.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/TiddlerInfo/ \define config-title() $:/config/Tix/ToolbarBottomButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end \define config-timestamp() $:/config/Tix/ToolbarBottomButtons/Timestamp/$(listItem)$ \end \define setTimestamp() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<>/> \end <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" value="">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ToolbarBottom]sort[]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]sort[]] -[[$:/core/ui/Buttons/fold-bar]] +[!is[draft]]" variable="listItem"> <$checkbox tiddler=<> field="text" checked="show" checkactions=<> unchecked="hide" default="hide"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="description"/>
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/Tools.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/Tools
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/Tools.caption: Bottom-Tools

$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/about.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/about.text: Add an additional toolbar to the bottom of every tiddler. It comes with buttons to jump to the top of a tiddler, to the next or to the previous tiddler and one more button that inserts a new tiddler just below. The bottom toolbar also accepts standard toolbar buttons.
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/about.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/about

$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/cfx.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/cfx.text:
Bottom Toolbar Configuration

Choose, what you would like to see. > The buttons in the bottom toolbar are sorted in the order of their activation.
Show toolbar <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/styles/hide/bottom-toolbar.css" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet" invertTag="yes"> tiddler bottom toolbar
Show buttons {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/Tools}}
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/cfx.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/cfx
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/cfx.caption: Bottom Toolbar

$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/support.creator: Thomas Elmiger
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/support.text:
!! Support the Author ''Hi!''
I am Thomas, the author of [[tid.li/tw5/plugins.html|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html]]. Feedback is always welcome, as well as funding for maintenance, support and new projects :) --- !!! One Time Support If using my plugins just makes you happy, consider a one time payment via ~PayPal to reward the effort: https://www.paypal.me/telmiger --- !!! Permanent Support If my tools make you more productive or save you time in your job or your everyday life, you can support me as a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/telmiger --- !!! Thank You Substantial parts of my availabe time go to the deveopment of useful plugins for [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com/]]. – Many others do the same and I would like to thank them all, especially [[Jeremy Ruston|https://tiddlywiki.com/#JeremyRuston]] and all the active members of the community! //Hereby I promise to share future revenues (if any) with other developers who’s works I use or who inspired me.// If you like my work, I would be very happy to hear from you. ''All the best,''
//Thomas// https://thomas-elmiger.ch
$:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/support.title: $:/plugins/telmiger/Btx/support
